data.content:
簡介Acker函數，並列出Acker(2,3)的求解過程。

●為一遞迴但不為原始遞迴的函數，輸入兩自然數，輸出一自然數，輸出增長速度高

●Acker( 2, 3 )
= Acker( 1, Acker( 2, 2 ) )
= Acker( 1, Acker( 2, 1 ) )
= Acker( 1, Acker( 2, 0 ) )
= Acker( 1, 1 )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 0 ) )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 2 )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 2 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 1 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 0 ) )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 2 )
= Acker( 0, 3 )
= Acker( 0, 4 )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 4 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 3 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 2 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 1 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 0 ) )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 2 )
= Acker( 0, 3 )
= Acker( 0, 4 )
= Acker( 0, 5 )
= Acker( 0, 6 )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 6 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 5 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 4 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 3 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 2 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 1 ) )
= Acker( 0, Acker( 1, 0 ) )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 1 )
= Acker( 0, 2 )
= Acker( 0, 3 )
= Acker( 0, 4 )
= Acker( 0, 5 )
= Acker( 0, 6 )
= Acker( 0, 7 )
= Acker( 0, 8 )
= 9
